description.narrative: Project will address following:Developing project pipeline in pilot municipalities;Improving transparency/accountability of municipal financial management,Enhancing local service delivery,Improving municipal and ministries’ management practices.

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

comment.narrative: Limited general strategic and project development capacities within the municipalities (some trainings and mentoring were organized by international organisations). None of the municipalities prepared Action plan for the implementation of the Municipal Development Strategies (Ministry of Economy). The Electronic database of development projects has just been launched, therefore none of the municipalities have started populating it (Ministry of Economy).

1. Provide expert assistance to the Ministry of Economic Development in the preparation of strategic and policy documents; 2. Provide further consultancy support to the selected Montenegrin municipalities in the preparation of strategic development plans; 3. Provide assistance to the Ministry of Economic Development in the preparation, promotion and implementation of technical and financial support to entrepreneurs and MSMEs, inclusive of the support to clusters; 4. Support the Ministry in the implementation and promotion of the concept of national brand; 5. Raise professional capacities of the Ministrys staff in the relevant sector fields.

1. Expert assistance provided to the Ministry of Economic Development in the preparation of legal and policy documents in the area of regional development; 2. Further consultancy support provided to the selected Montenegrin municipalities in the preparation of strategic development plans - two new municipalities involved in the process and three plans finalized in 2021; 3. Assistance provided to the Ministry of Economic Development in the preparation, promotion and implementation of technical and financial support to entrepreneurs and MSMEs through the creation of online platform for application and accompanying brochure.

1. Further support provided to six (6) selected municipalities (Gusinje, Budva, Danilovgrad, Pljevlja, Bar and Mojkovac)in the preparation of strategic development plans (the total of 19 municipalities have received support in development of SDPs); 2. Under the Cluster Development Programme 2017-2020, ten project proposals were approved for nine clusters by the Ministry of Economy, available subsidies amounted to 150,000 EUR and UNDP consultancy support provided to all interested applicants; 3. Professional capacities of the Ministry of Economys employees working on national brand development raised through training.

1. Provide expert assistance to the Ministry of Economic Development in the preparation of strategic and policy documents; 2. Provide further consultancy support to the selected Montenegrin municipalities in the preparation of strategic development plans and calculation of competitiveness index; 3. Provide assistance to the Ministry of Economic Development in the preparation, promotion and implementation of technical and financial support to entrepreneurs and MSMEs, inclusive of the support to clusters; 4. Provide support the Ministry in the implementation and promotion of the concept of national brand.
